data.title: How To Get To Imperial War Museum London
data.meta_description: IWM London is located at Lambeth Road, London, SE1 6HZ. FREE admission. Book Tickets Online. Book in advance or walk up anytime on the day
data.text:
How to find us

IWM London is easily accessible by public transport.

What3Words: ///fluid.bulb.rear

Travel by underground or rail

Nearest stations:

Lambeth North (7 minute walk)

Elephant and Castle (10 minute walk)

Waterloo (14 minute walk)

Travel by bus

Nearest bus stops:

Lambeth Road: 344 and 360 bus routes

Kennington Road: 3, 59 and 159 bus routes

Travel by bike

Cycleway 6 runs past IWM London from Elephant and Castle.

Nearest Santander cycle docking stations:

Geraldine Street

Kennington Road

Blue Badge parking

A limited number of designated blue badge parking spaces are located off Brook Drive, behind IWM London.

These spaces are subject to availability.

Please contact us, or telephone 020 7416 5000 to reserve a space at least three days before your visit. You will need to provide your registration number and a contact phone number.

Car parking

There is no general car parking at IWM London.

Location

IWM

Address

IWM London

Lambeth Road

London

SE1 6HZ

Lambeth North Underground

Elephant & Castle Underground

London Waterloo National Rail

Bus Routes 3, 59, 159, 344, and 360

Stories and news straight to your inbox

Hear about our collections, exhibitions, stories, events and other ways you can support us. Sign up now and enjoy a 10% discount in our IWM shop.
